home.s1text: We are quality you can rely on. We innovate to provide you with the excellence in equipment for the best possible experience.
home.s2text1: We are quality you can rely on. We innovate to provide you with the excellence in equipment for the best possible experience.
home.s2text2: Gautama Group gives you a unique product to make your experience better than it ever was before by providing innovative solutions for smoking equipment and always using only the best and sustainable materials, whether you prefer to smoke at home, outside, or in nature.
home.s2text3: We know on our own how annoying it can be to carry around big and heavy grinder which only hardly fits into pocket on shorts during the summer or how difficult it is to roll outside, no matter if we are talking about city or middle of the forest on hiking trip. We feel the need to provide market with solutions all smokers deserve to have.

about.headline: Our story
about.text: Our team was celebrating a reunion after a few months without seeing each other at our favorite bar back in December 2016. As it usually happens after a couple of beers, one of us asked the always important question: “Who’s gonna roll?” While we do not remember who the lucky one to roll was, we do remember that during all the necessary preparation it was realized that none of us had a crusher or anything that could be used as a mixing tray. At the same time, we realized that despite many products available on the market, there was still a need for something that would simplify the daily life of a smoker even more, and if there was such a product, it was not easy to find. So before our “masterpiece” of the evening was finished, we came up with an idea of rolling papers which contain a filter, tray and crusher all in one  package that can fit comfortably in a pocket. From this moment on, inventing new products like this became our nighttime entertainment. This small activity that we would partake in is how our company Gautama Group s.r.o. became established. We are here to provide innovative solutions to an area of products that have been nearly unchanged for decades.

products.name: King Size Slim Papers
products.description: Our cigarette papers are unbleached, made of pure hemp without use of any chemicals or harmful substances. We use organic glue from the Acacia tree (arabic gum). Ultra-slim and slow-burning paper that is friendly to the environment.

products.name: King Size Slim Papers + Tips
products.description: We combine our organic and unbleached King Size Slim Rolling papers with wide filters made from recycled paper to give you more enjoyment from smoking. Friendly to the environment without compromising quality.

products.name: King Size Slim Papers + Tips + Tray
products.description: The tray comes directly attached on the packaging. The tray holds it's shape with the help of a  rubber band so to provide an increased comfort while rolling. And of course, our 100% organic papers and filters are always standard.

products.name: King Size Slim Papers + Tips + Tray + Crusher
products.description: Our main product - cigarette paper containing filters, tray and crusher. This model contains all the necessary equipment, the size of which only slightly exceeds the size of classic rolling papers. The packaging is comfortable to carry around and provides desirable comfort and a practical solution for every situation. As always, 100% Organic materials of the highest quality are commonplace for all elements of this product.

gautama.heading: Gautama Group
gautama.description: Gautama Group is a community in which artists, athletes and companies in various business sectors are working together united by one common passion. The community is built on mutual support of its members and its aim is to help the growth of individuals through cooperation. Gautama Group creates countless opportunities and in addition helps to create long-term and prosperous relationships.
gautama.info: If you are interested in joining the Gautama Group, do not hesitate to contact us for more information.
